publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-316 Sandra White: Glasgow Met Wins Goldâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Glasgow Metropolitan College on winning gold and silver awards at the UK Skills live architectural glasswork competition, the first ever live event for glasswork in the United Kingdom, which was organised and run by Glasgow Metropolitan College on behalf of UK Skills Challenge; acknowledges the hard work and dedication shown by staff and students in preparing for and taking part in this competition, and believes that through this Glasgow Metropolitan College and its students have raised their profile and standing throughout the UK, bringing credit to both Glasgow and Scotland. Supported by: Ken Macintosh*, Pauline McNeill*, Robert Brown*, Jackson Carlaw*, Margaret Mitchell*, Alex Neil*, Bashir Ahmad*, Bill Kidd*, Alasdair Allan*, Jackie Baillie*
S3M-316 Glasgow Met Wins Gold (lodged on 25 July 2007) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-316 Glasgow Met Wins Gold (lodged on 25 July 2007) Elaine Smith*
S3M-316 Glasgow Met Wins Gold (lodged on 25 July 2007) Gil Paterson*
S3M-316 Glasgow Met Wins Gold (lodged on 25 July 2007) Kenneth Gibson*
